title:
Pointwise and Oscillation Estimates via Riesz Potentials for Mixed Local
  and Nonlocal Parabolic Equations
authors: Lingwei Ma, Qi Xiong, Zhenqiu Zhang
abstract:
We establish a class of pointwise estimates for weak solutions to mixed local
and nonlocal parabolic equations involving measure data and merely measurable
coefficients via caloric Riesz potentials. Such estimates effectively bound the
sizes and oscillations of weak solutions, respectively. The proof relies on
demonstrating a new local H\"{o}lder estimate with an optimal $L^q$-Tail for
weak solutions to the corresponding homogeneous problem, which remarkably
extends the $L^\infty$-Tail in previous work. It is worth mentioning that our
main results capture both local and nonlocal features of the double phase
parabolic equations and, more importantly, remain valid for SOLA (Solutions
Obtained by Limit of Approximations).
